playbook_id: Prisma Cloud Remediation - AWS CloudTrail Misconfiguration v2
suggestion_reason: Recommended for Cloud IAM user access alerts
description: This trigger is responsible for handling AWS CloudTrail Misconfiguration alerts

OR.SEARCH_VALUE: AWS CloudTrail is not enabled on the account
AWS CloudTrail is not enabled with multi trail and not capturing all management events
AWS CloudTrail log validation is not enabled in all regions
AWS CloudTrail trail logs is not integrated with CloudWatch Log
